title: Freda Fleischman, Faitu, and Her Father, Highlands North
credit_line: The William T. Hillman Fund for Photography
provenance_text:
Goldblatt [b. 1930]; gift to Barry Callaghan [b. 1937], mid-1970s; purchased by Stephen Bulger Gallery, Toronto, Ontario, Canada, 2012; possessed by Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, May 2016 [1]; purchased by Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, September 2016.

[1] PGH Photo Fair, May 2016
